textBox.richText: The Replay-Attack Database for face spoofing consists of 1300 video clips of photo and video attack attempts to 50 clients, under different lighting conditions. This Database was produced at the Idiap Research Institute, in Switzerland. Please cite: “On the Effectiveness of Local Binary Patterns in Face Anti-spoofing”, Ivana Chingovska, André Anjos, Sébastien Marcel, IEEE BIOSIG 2012. Link: https://www.idiap.ch/dataset/replayattack
